title: About
content: "Fundamenty, fun way of building sites!\nCreating a website is FUN, easy, secure and free!\nOnly few steps to have your own hompage\n\nClone the starter\n\nRename your project\nAdd contents in ./src/{lang}/pages and ./src/{lang}/posts\nAdd WEB_PATH_PREFIX in GitLab/GitHub's CI variables.\nPush it to your own GitLab/GitHub repo\n\nGitLab/GitHub CI will do its magic, and in few minutes you will see your page!\n"
